discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
D. Enable Escalate to Case.

Enabling Escalate to Case functionality allows unanswered questions or those requiring internal attention to be escalated to cases within Salesforce. This ensures that questions requiring internal visibility are captured within the case management system, where they can be assigned, tracked, and resolved by appropriate personnel. This integration between the community platform and case management system streamlines internal visibility and ensures timely responses to customer inquiries.

choices.C: Limit the number of questions posted per day.
choices.A: Tell users to submit a case for unanswered questions.

Selected Answer: D
The Account Portal template is designed to provide customers with access to their accounts and related functionalities, such as managing account details, creating and managing cases, and accessing knowledge base articles. This template is well-suited for subscription-based models where customers need to manage their accounts, submit support requests, and access resources.

Cloud Kicks (CK) has a subscription model to send new sneakers to customers every month. Customers log in to the CK site, where they can manage their accounts, manage and create cases, and submit refund claims. CK also provides access to articles from its Knowledge base.

Which template should CK use to give customers the access they need?

discussion.content:

Advanced sharing rules usage is not allowed for Customer Community user nor Customer community Login User so the correct answer is A and B

Selected Answer: AD
Option B, Partner Community User, is typically used for partners rather than customers. Option C, Customer Community User, is similar to the Customer Community Login User license but may not provide the necessary features for advanced sharing rules in this scenario.

Therefore, options A and D are the most suitable license types to grant to customers to support the sharing requirement for customer subscriptions in Cloud Kicks (CK).

Which two user license types should be granted to customers to support this sharing requirement? (Choose two.)

Ursa Major Solar (UMS) uses a third party to manage low-severity tickets using its legacy system. Sometimes, third-party agents have to create cases on behalf of UMS customers.

Which user licenses should the implementation practitioner recommend for third-party staff?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
Answer D, because this license type allows third-party staff to access cases, leads, opportunities, contracts, and custom objects on behalf of UMS customers. Partner Community users can also create cases from questions, escalate questions to cases, and view Knowledge articles. Partner Community users cannot access quotes or reports and dashboards.

Selected Answer: A
A. Customer Community Plus

The Customer Community Plus license provides access to advanced features within Salesforce Communities, including the ability to create and manage cases. It also offers additional customization options and features compared to the standard Customer Community license. This license type allows third-party staff to create cases on behalf of UMS customers while providing them with the necessary functionality for managing low-severity tickets.

Option B, Customer Community, may not provide the required features and flexibility for managing cases effectively.

Selected Answer: B
This should be B. Only cases need to be created. Answer should be Customer Community
